channel.title: [Camp Ochre Jelly] Dogs in the Vineyard One Shot
channel.description:
(This is a practice post done for the Gauntlet Facilitator Camp.)
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: 1 Session
DURATION: 4 hours
NUMBER OF PLAYERS: Total of 3
DESCRIPTION: Dogs in the Vineyard is a game by Vincent Baker about paladins/postal workers who travel from town to town delivering mail ... and also justice according to their weird religious laws and dogmas.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: CATS, Lines & Veils, X-Card. The Open Door Policy is in place as well as the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct. (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
BREAKS: Ten minute breaks on the top of the hour
RECORDED: With permission granted before and after each session.
PRIOR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED: No, rules will be taught in play.
Session One: [date=2021-06-19 time=06:30:00 timezone="Asia/Kolkata"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MbP3YhJ5Ug8pFltN8VC
